attributes.action: Publicise UK government's evidence of Bashar al-Assad's use of chemical weapons.
attributes.background: Also evidence of chemical weapon production or storage facilities controlled or authorised by the Syrian President since 2002 to present day.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Prime Minister made a statement to the House of Commons on Monday 16 April about the UK's Government's actions in Syria. You can read the statement, and the Prime Minister's answers to questions from MPs, here:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2018-04-16/debates/92610F86-2B91-4105-AE8B-78D018453D1B/Syria

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
